steps.1: Pour-Pour 1 egg into the ramekin cup
steps.2: Place -Place the egg from the cup over the lettuce
steps.3: Coat -Coat a 6-oz. ramekin cup with cooking spray
steps.4: Microwave-Microwave the ramekin cup uncovered on high for 30 seconds
steps.5: sprinkle -sprinkle 1 tablespoon of cheese on cup
steps.6: Top -Top cup with 1 tablespoon of salsa
steps.7: replace -replace the top of the English muffin
steps.8: Microwave -Continue to Microwave for 15-30 more seconds or until the egg is almost set
steps.9: Line -Line the bottom piece of the English muffin with lettuce
steps.10: Microwave -Microwave just until cheese melts, about 10 seconds
steps.12: Cut -Cut the English muffin into two pieces with a knife
